q: The pair's site is a gathering place for grassroots conservatives to sign a petition urging Mike Pence to choose a run for the White House. Computers can intuit for people: Google chief London: In 50 years, computers will be able to intuit for people, Eric Schmidt , the chief of internet search engine giant Google, predicts. There will be a ubiquitous computational capability so amazing that people will assume that it is an assistant. It knows who you are, it knows what you do, it makes suggestions, it intuits things for you, Eric Schmidt told British daily the Telegraph. View result Eric Schmidt said that people who "opt in" to the system will begin experiencing a much richer relationship with technology, aided by their computerised "personal assistant

" The congressman's future has been the subject of speculation since he resigned the No. 3 GOP House leadership slot after winning a sixth term in November.
